## Rule name

`suggested_rule_name`

## Description

What should this rule detect?

## Bad example

```dart
// Code that should trigger the lint
```

## Good example

```dart
// Code that should NOT trigger the lint
```

## Quick fix

Should this rule include an auto-fix? If so, describe the transformation.
